Content: add another and it is -70%

Author: jl777c#5810

Author: jl777c#5810

Content: the real BET chain is the store of value

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: even if the game is bankrupted, the BET coins are won by someone, who can just redeem to BET and deposit in the next REKTi chain
